tswitem.name: Piercing Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Piercing Augment Resonator
An unattuned damage augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will increase your penetration chance by 1,5%/ 3%/ 4,5%/ 6%/ 7,5% for this ability.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 2 Attuned Accurate Augment Resonators
  • 24 Pure trinity runes
  • 36 Pure fire
